select dis.id,dis.name,dis.longitude,dis.latitude,dis.count#{serviceId} as count from cs_district dis where dis.count#{serviceId} !=0
order by count desc limit 5

select dis.name,a.name as leakName,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_alarm a,cs_district dis
select dis.name,a.name as leakName,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_taskwarn a,cs_district dis
where a.districtId = dis.id and a.districtId = #{districtId} and a.serviceId = #{serviceId} group by a.name order by count desc limit 5

select a.name,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_alarm a, (select t.taskId,t.group_Id from cs_task t, (select oa.id from cs_order_asset oa, (select o.id from cs_order o where serviceId = #{serviceId}) o1 where o1.id = oa.orderId) oa1 where t.order_asset_Id = oa1.id) t1 where (a.taskId=t1.taskId or a.group_Id = t1.group_Id)
select a.name,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_taskwarn a, (select t.taskId,t.group_Id from cs_task t, (select oa.id from cs_order_asset oa, (select o.id from cs_order o where serviceId = #{serviceId}) o1 where o1.id = oa.orderId) oa1 where t.order_asset_Id = oa1.id) t1 where (a.task_Id=t1.taskId or a.group_Id = t1.group_Id)
group by a.name order by count desc limit 5

select DATE_FORMAT(a.alarm_time,'%Y.%c') months,count(a.id) count from cs_alarm a, (select t.taskId,t.group_Id from cs_task t, (select oa.id from cs_order_asset oa, (select o.id from cs_order o where serviceId = #{serviceId}) o1 where o1.id = oa.orderId) oa1 where t.order_asset_Id = oa1.id) t1 where (a.taskId=t1.taskId or a.group_Id = t1.group_Id)
select DATE_FORMAT(a.warn_time,'%Y.%c') months,count(a.id) count from cs_taskwarn a, (select t.taskId,t.group_Id from cs_task t, (select oa.id from cs_order_asset oa, (select o.id from cs_order o where serviceId = #{serviceId}) o1 where o1.id = oa.orderId) oa1 where t.order_asset_Id = oa1.id) t1 where (a.task_Id=t1.taskId or a.group_Id = t1.group_Id)
group by months order by months limit 5
